docstring.long_description:
The connection is made with the VISA address in the Flojoy UI.

This block should work with any Teledyne LeCroy T3DSO1000(A)-2000 series oscilloscope.
docstring.short_description: Connect to a Teledyne Lecroy T3DSO1000(A)-2000 oscilloscope.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The VISA address to connect to.
